column3: WORDS I KNOW ARE: HELP | INVENTORY | GO | N | S | E | W | U | D | GET | DROP | OPEN | EXAMINE | READ | SAY | DIG | SWING | CLIMB | LIGHT | UNLIGHT | SPRAY | USE | UNLOCK | QUIT | SCORE
IT SAYS USE THIS WORD WITH CARE 'XZANFAR'
THE SCRIPT IS IN AN ALIEN TONGUE
WHAT DO YOU WANT TO DIG WITH?
IT TURNS ON! YOU DO SOME CLEANING AND THEN TURN IT OFF
YOU HAVE NOTHING TO LIGHT IT WITH
YOUR CANDLE IS WASTED AND CAN'T BE LIT UP ANYMORE
SORRY. NO VIOLENCE IS ALLOWED IN THIS GAME.

LETS JUST LEAVE THIS THING ALONE
STUDY WITH DESK & HOLE IN WALL
STUDY WITH DESK & CRACK IN WALL
A MAGICAL BARRIER PREVENTS YOU FROM GOING WEST AND TAKING THE PAINTING
YOU CAN'T CARRY A BOAT THIS WAY
UPPER GALLERY *THERE IS A GHOST THAT WILL NOT LET YOU MOVE*
IT TURNS ON! WHIZZ YOU VACUUMED THE GHOST UP!
YOU ARE STUCK IN THE MARSH.  NEXT TIME GET A BOAT

WELCOME TO THE HAUNTED HOUSE ADVENTURE. THIS GAME IS BASED OFF THE 1983 USBORNE BOOK 'HOW TO WRITE ADVENTURE PROGRAMS' WRITTEN FOR THE BBC/APPLE COMPUTERS.  THE GAME USES SIMPLE VERBS AND TWO WORDED ACTIONS.  THE DETAIL AND DESCRIPTIONS ARE BASIC AS THIS IS HOW THEY ARE IN THE ORIGINAL.  IT IS NOT A DIFFICULT GAME BUT YOU MIGHT GET STUCK AND NEED TO START AGAIN.  TO WIN YOU MUST PICK UP ALL 8 TREASURES AND COME BACK TO THIS LOCATION.  GOOD LUCK!
YOU CAN'T CARRY A BOAT THIS WAY

column4: IT IS MADE OUT OF GOLD AND HAS JEWELS AROUND THE TOP

THESE ARE NEEDED IF YOU NEED A LIGHT
